Name: Lead Generation Specialist (Linkedin)
Task:
We are looking for 2 Lead Generation (Linkedin) specialists who can perform the following daily tasks for our outreach campaigns.

1) Scrape the LinkedIn jobs for assigned keywords and research the hiring manager.
2) Create a list with the email/phone of the hiring manager along with the job title.
3) Run the collected email through the zero bounce or similar tool.
4) Share a clean verified emails/phone/lead name/lead title/job title

This is an ongoing project for someone who can deliver quality leads daily.

Looking forward to the application.
Regards
RJ

Name: Data Scraper Needed for Market Research

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web scraping, data extraction, and data management. You will be responsible for creating and maintaining scraping scripts, ensuring data accuracy, and delivering clean datasets on time. Familiarity with Python, Beautiful Soup, and data cleaning tools is essential. If you are detail-oriented and have a passion for data, we want to hear from you!

Name: Data Mining of Old WhatsApp Messages

The ideal candidate will extract and organize important information, conversations, and media from my chat history. This project requires attention to detail and familiarity with WhatsApp's data structure. Your expertise will help me retrieve valuable insights from my past communications efficiently.

Name: Web Scraping Consultant/Developer needed for web scraping and data management
Task:
I am looking for a skilled web scraper to extract data from a specific website and store it locally for later query using keyword searches. The ideal candidate should have experience with web scraping tools and techniques, and formatting scraped data correctly both locally and with web hosting.  If you have a proven track record in web scraping and data management, I would love to hear from you.

-----------------------------------------

GOAL
Extract data from a specific public website and store it locally for me to access and query at my convenience. The website contains "Projects" and variables that can be indexed to each project. Each "Project" also has a varying number of PDF documents that can be downloaded. I want the PDF documents downloaded and converted to text so that I can run keyword searches, and have document names and their associated project returned to me.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Data indexing
Every project will have designations for:

Project name (example = D/2015/1134/C)
Address
Application
Description
Estimated cost
Lodged date
Decision
Decision data
Decision by

Every project will also have PDF documents. For each document I want:
Matching project name
Document title
Document text (I want all the text in a document converted into readable text that can be queried in the future)
Skills_Expertise: Web ScrapingData ScrapingData MiningData EntryData ExtractionPythonWeb CrawlingSQLScrapy

Name: No-Code/Low-Code Chatbot with Automated Data Scraping for Swiss Clinics
Task:
Job Description:
We need to develop a chatbot for several private medical clinics in Switzerland. The chatbot should answer user questions about doctors (specialties, contact details, etc.). However, the relevant information is spread across multiple clinic websites with different structures, no sitemaps, and pagination (“Next” buttons) that make automated crawling difficult. Our current no-code chatbot platform can’t properly scrape these sites.

What We’re Looking For:
	1.	Data Scraping/Extraction: A reliable way (preferably no-code/low-code or minimal coding) to gather all necessary data (doctors, specialties, contact info) from each clinic’s site.
	2.	Data Maintenance: A solution to keep this information updated in case the website content changes.
	3.	Chatbot Integration: Once the data is gathered, we want to integrate it into a user-friendly chatbot (embedded on a landing page) that can immediately respond with the right doctor/clinic info.

Scope & Requirements:
	•	We welcome suggestions for no-code SaaS tools or low-code scripts.
	•	The main challenge is dealing with complex site structures (no sitemap, multiple pagination levels).
	•	We want the chatbot to be easy for end-users to query and for us to maintain.

Please include in your proposal:
	•	Your suggested approach (tools, workflows, or platforms).
	•	Implementation plan and estimated timeline.
	•	Rough cost or pricing model.

Thank you! We look forward to finding the right expert to help us.
Skills_Expertise: Chatbot DevelopmentArtificial IntelligenceChatbotBot DevelopmentTwilio APIAutomationSocial Media ChatbotAI ChatbotChatbot IntegrationChatbot TuningGPT ChatbotMachine LearningGenerative AIAPI DevelopmentDialogflow
